channel.title: Need Help With this client! LOOK PLEASE!
channel.description:
Hello, I recently downloaded the Azn V4 Cheat Client. When you open it, It looks like this.
[URL=http://img219.imageshack.us/i/azn.png/][IMG]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/8841/azn.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img219/azn.png/1/][IMG]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/azn.png/1/w800.png[/img][/URL]
Then, When I run the client, I switch my Server Ip to the server I play,Which as you can see in the picture is Morshier.no-ip.info. Then I put in my username, password, then It says "Error: Connection Failed".
[URL=http://img186.imageshack.us/i/azn1.png/][IMG]http://img186.imageshack.us/img186/5578/azn1.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img186/azn1.png/1/][IMG]http://img186.imageshack.us/img186/azn1.png/1/w800.png[/img][/URL]
Therefore, Does anyone know what I need to do to start playing on the Azn Client? Or do I need to copy and paste any files from the Morshier Client's folder over to the Azn clients folder? Please Help Me! Thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2009, 08:31:57 am[/size][hr]Also, I just tried... I can use on other servers. But not the server I want to use it on. :eek:

Hello, I recently downloaded the Azn V4 Cheat Client. When you open it, It looks like this.

Then, When I run the client, I switch my Server Ip to the server I play,Which as you can see in the picture is Morshier.no-ip.info. Then I put in my username, password, then It says “Error: Connection Failed”.

Therefore, Does anyone know what I need to do to start playing on the Azn Client? Or do I need to copy and paste any files from the Morshier Client’s folder over to the Azn clients folder?
